snippet: The American Council on Education and Coursera announced on Wednesday that five Coursera offerings were similar enough to traditional college courses to be eligible for credit.
abstract: American Council on Education and online education provider Coursera announce that five Coursera offerings are similar enough to traditional college courses to be eligible for credit.
lead_paragraph: The American Council on Education and Coursera announced on Wednesday that five Coursera offerings were similar enough to traditional college courses to be eligible for credit.

headline.main: Five Online Courses Are Eligible for College Credit
headline.print_headline: Five Online Courses Are Eligible For College Credit
